trend_summary: The eastern town edges outwards, adding low-rise housing and a few industrial sheds. Forest cover expands over scattered fields, especially west and centre, though the latest image shows drought-related browning there. Cultivated patchwork persists but contracts slightly. Road layout is largely stable. Net change: modest settlement growth within an otherwise farm-and-woodland rural landscape.
notable_changes: Gradual outward expansion and infill around the main eastern settlement core.
Emergence of small residential clusters along radial roads northeast and south.
Conversion of several central and western fields to young woodland and hedgerow blocks.
Marked browning of western forests/crops in the most recent image, indicating drought or fire impact.
